attributes.action: Proposed ban of ALL modifications to all vehicles
attributes.additional_details: As most motorcyclists know the EU is currently in discussion to take ALL our rights away to choose what we ride , how we modify & service and carry work out on our own vehicles as well as what we wear on our motorcycles , this is discrimination, I propose a ban on ALL vehicle modifications , so there for ALL road registered vehicle is standard , and have a regulated decibel limit of 80 decibels , all vehicle owners shall not be allowed to repair or service their own vehicle , it is not one rule for one & 6 for another all legal road users need the same laws !
